name: Pupitar
author: Hajime Kusajima
flavor_text: Its body is hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.

poke_body.name: Energy Protection
poke_body.effect: Any damage done to Pupitar by attacks is reduced by 10 for each Energy attached to Pupitar (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can’t reduce more than 30 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.
